title: Competitive team Fusion Gaming,  looking to complete roster, come trial! LF Jungle, Top, Mid D5+
body:
Hey Luigi here, Owner and AD Carry of Fusion Gaming. 

After the Christmas break, Fusion has had several roles have opened up, with top, mid and jungle looking to be filled as soon as possible. 

With eyes set on the Oceanic Open League (OOL) and beyond, we are looking for dedicated and motivated players, willing to put time into practice (3-4 days/week), and aspiring to take their game to the next level.

To smooth out the application process, we are running a trial team, where all potential candidates will be able to experience the Fusion team environment. Following this, the main roster of 5 will be decided, and preparation for OOL will commence on the main team.

To apply, email me with why you are interested, or add and message me on League.

Cheers, 
Luigi

IGN: Fusion Luigi
Email: luigi.bot19@gmail.com
Fusion: D4 75lp

replies.body: ill take a role. #74 best jinx oce.
